WITH ORDEREDSELFPR AS ( SELECT A.MEM_ID, A.PR_NO, A.PR_DATE, A.PR_NAME, A.PR_CONTENT, A.PR_WANTJOB, A.PR_ANNUAL, A.PR_WANTMN, A.PR_WANTTYPE, A.REGION_CODE, A.INDUSTRY_CODE, A.PR_EDU, B.MEM_NAME, C.MEM_GENDER, C.MEM_EMAIL, C.MEM_TEL, C.MEM_ADDR1, D.REGION_NAME, E.INDUSTRY_NAME, F.ATT_SAVENAME FROM PR A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN SEEKER C ON (B.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN CD_REGION D ON (A.REGION_CODE = D.REGION_CODE) INNER JOIN CD_INDUSTRY E ON (A.INDUSTRY_CODE = E.INDUSTRY_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH F ON A.MEM_ID = F.TBL_ID
ORDER BY PR_NO DESC ) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ORDEREDSELFPR.* FROM ORDEREDSELFPR ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT A.MEM_ID, A.PR_NO, A.PR_NAME, A.PR_DATE, A.PR_CONTENT, A.PR_WANTJOB, A.PR_ANNUAL, A.PR_WANTMN, A.PR_WANTTYPE, A.PR_EDU, A.REGION_CODE, A.INDUSTRY_CODE, B.MEM_NAME, C.MEM_GENDER, C.MEM_EMAIL, C.MEM_TEL, C.MEM_ADDR1, D.REGION_NAME, E.INDUSTRY_NAME FROM PR A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN SEEKER C ON (B.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN CD_REGION D ON (A.REGION_CODE = D.REGION_CODE) INNER JOIN CD_INDUSTRY E ON (A.INDUSTRY_CODE = E.INDUSTRY_CODE) WHERE PR_NO = #{prNo}
